verses.verse: Out of the depths have I cried unto thee, O YHVH.
YHVH, hear my voice: let thine ears be attentive to the voice of my supplications.
If thou, YAH, shouldest mark iniquities, O YHVH, who shall stand?
But there is forgiveness with thee, that thou mayest be feared.
I wait for YHVH, my soul doth wait, and in his word do I hope.
My soul waiteth for YHVH more than they that watch for the morning: I say, more than they that watch for the morning.
Let Israel hope in YHVH: for with YHVH there is mercy, and with him is plenteous redemption.
And he shall redeem Israel from all his iniquities.
